title: TRP Wireless Electronic Gravel Group for Classified Hub Breaks Cover at Unbound
content:
Arno Van Den Broeck rides to 30th place at Unbound with the Classified Powershift Hub and wireless electronic components of a new gravel groupset from TRP Cycling

Read the full article at TRP Wireless Electronic Gravel Group for Classified Hub Breaks Cover at Unbound on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
